Changelog
=========

0.0.3 (2021-10-26)
------------------

- added support for generating data via Weka's data generators


0.0.2 (2021-04-12)
------------------

- requiring python-weka-wrapper3 version 0.2.1 at least in order to offer pickle support


0.0.1 (2021-03-28)
------------------

- initial release
